description: Change of use of floors seven, eight and nine of Frobisher Crescent from B1 Office to 69 Class C3 Residential units (6365sqm) (68,487sq. feet); installation of reproduction timber sliding doors and windows to the south elevation at eighth floor level; installation of hinged glass balcony partitioning to the south elevation external flat corridors at seventh, eighth and ninth floors levels to create separate private balconies, and installation of motors and mechanisms to refurbished brise soliel.
